name: Startup India Seed Fund Scheme
benefits: Up to INR 50 lakhs for prototype development, product trials, and market entry.

name: MSME Innovation Scheme
benefits: Provides R&D grants, design support, and marketing assistance.

name: Atal Innovation Mission
benefits: Innovation labs, incubation centers, and mentorship support for startups.

name: SIDBI Fund of Funds
benefits: Funding support through venture capital funds managed by SIDBI.
